north_star: Enable seamless, reliable, and efficient deployment of applications across SiriusXM, ensuring fast time-to-market and high-quality releases.
mission: To provide robust, scalable, and user-friendly deployment pipelines that empower development teams to deliver software with confidence and speed.
vision: To create a deployment platform that allows for continuous delivery and integration, minimizing downtime and maximizing productivity for development teams.
values_principals: Reliability First: Ensure deployments are reliable and consistent.
Automation: Automate repetitive tasks to reduce errors and save time.
Speed and Efficiency: Optimize deployment processes for speed without compromising quality.
Security: Maintain high security standards in all deployment processes.
Transparency: Provide clear and accessible deployment metrics and logs.

team_structure.title: Team Lead
team_structure.responsibilities: Oversee team operations, prioritize tasks, and ensure alignment with broader goals.

team_structure.title: DevOps Engineer
team_structure.responsibilities: Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines and deployment infrastructure.

team_structure.title: Release Manager
team_structure.responsibilities: Coordinate and manage release schedules and deployment plans.

team_structure.title: Security Engineer
team_structure.responsibilities: Ensure deployment processes meet security and compliance standards.

team_structure.title: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
team_structure.responsibilities: Monitor and improve the reliability and performance of deployment processes.

priorities: Develop and maintain robust CI/CD pipelines.
Ensure deployments are secure and compliant.
Optimize deployment processes for speed and reliability.
Provide clear and accessible deployment metrics and logs.
Coordinate and manage release schedules efficiently.

meeting_cadence.purpose: Quick updates on progress, blockers, and plans for the day.
Plan the work for the upcoming sprint.
meeting_cadence.attendees: Team Lead, DevOps Engineers, Release Manager

meeting_cadence.purpose: Reflect on the past sprint and identify areas for improvement.
Team coordination and updates on ongoing projects.

meeting_cadence.attendees: Release Manager, DevOps Engineers, QA Representatives

performance_metrics.justification: Higher deployment frequency indicates a more agile and responsive development process.
A lower change failure rate indicates more reliable deployments.
performance_metrics.measurement: Percentage of deployments causing failures in production.

performance_metrics.justification: A lower MTTR indicates quicker recovery from deployment failures.
performance_metrics.measurement: Average time taken to recover from deployment failures.

performance_metrics.justification: Shorter lead times indicate more efficient deployment processes.
performance_metrics.measurement: Time taken from code commit to production deployment.

service_level_agreements.SLA: 99% of deployments executed without critical issues.
Initial response within 15 minutes for deployment-related issues, 90% of issues resolved within 2 hours.
All releases planned and communicated at least 48 hours in advance.
